name: Copy_bac_producto
data:
select 0, 'Todos' from dual
UNION
select id_producto, concat(portal.nombre,' - ',prod.nombre)
from bac_producto prod, bac_portal portal
where prod.id_portal = portal.id_portal
and (portal.id_portal = $P{Copy_bac_portal} or $P{Copy_bac_portal} = 0 )

name: Copy_bac_producto_dependiente_portal
data:
select 0, 'Todos' from dual
UNION
select id_producto, concat(portal.nombre,' - ',prod.nombre)
from bac_producto prod, bac_portal portal
where prod.id_portal = portal.id_portal
and (portal.id_portal = $P{Copy_bac_portal} or $P{Copy_bac_portal} = 0 )

name: CC_City
data:
select id, name
from cities
where is_approved = 1
union
select '-1', 'Todas las ciudades'
union
select '-2', 'M√°s de 1 ciudad'
;

name: CC_Deal_Pending
data:
select d.id, substr(cast(concat(date_format(d.start_date, '%Y/%m/%d'),
                          ' - ',
                          c.name,
                          ' - ',
                          d.name) AS char),
              1,
              60) company
from deals d, companies c
where d.company_id = c.id
and exists (
  select 1
  from deal_externals de
  where d.id = de.deal_id
  and de.external_status in ('W','P')
)
order by d.start_date

name: CC_Deal
data:
SELECT d.id,
       substr(cast(concat(date_format(d.start_date, '%Y/%m/%d'),
                          ' - ',
                          c.name,
                          ' - ',
                          d.name) AS char),
              1,
              60)
  FROM deals d, companies c
 WHERE d.company_id = c.id
ORDER BY start_date DESC;

name: CC_company
data:
SELECT c.id,
       substr(cast(c.name AS char), 1, 60)
  FROM companies c
ORDER BY c.name ASC;
